subj-group.subject: [Papers Presented at the First O'Leary Symposium, "Funding of Public Schools: The Economic and Social Value of Adequate Funding", held in Chicago on February 16 and 17, 2006]

title-group.article-title: Evaluating the Reliability, Validity, and Usefulness of Education Cost Studies
